channel.title: introspection on all things considered...
channel.description: Recent content in introspection on all things considered...

item.title: First Retrospection
item.description: I am trying different things at the moment about retro- or introspection for myself. One thing that I know others are doing are weekly mails to all their directs1. I’ve also seen this via some form of weekly blog post. My default working mode is transparency so why sending mails to only a few select people when I can also just give them the link. Whomever might be interested later might find this useful - or not.
